title: Indonesian cemetery photo wrongly shared in posts about Sri Lankan coronavirus deaths

title: Confession made to a police officer by an accused inadmissible - CA
snippet: The Court of Appeal in its recent judgment held that an accused who made a confession to a police officer would be inadmissible and no confession made to a police officer should be proved as against a person accused of any offence.

title: Misleading posts claiming Sri Lanka 'ranked first' in global Covid-19 deaths circulate online
snippet: A claim has been shared in multiple Facebook posts that Sri Lanka "surpassed all other nations and ranked first" in Covid-19 death rates on August 8, 2021. But these posts are misleading: they show incomplete data from a database of global Covid-19 trends.

title: Sri Lanka's First Capital Holdings profits lower

title: Among France's poorest, once-lagging vaccine rates jump

title: Sri Lanka rupee non-credible peg breaks to 211-215 to US dollar

title: Govt.should be flexible and heed to medical experts: Maithri
